articles.description: The picture, titled 'Head Of A Bear', is being sold in London by the Christie's auction house, but not before it has gone on display in New York, Hong Kong and London.
articles.content:
Leonardo Da Vinci's drawing of the head of a bear is set to be sold for up to £12 million in an auction, despite measuring less than three inches squared.
